channel.title: Some questions! Help please!
channel.description:
When a person gets a 99, he still is not allowed to wear some of 99 capes, even if he gets 14m in it too? can you help me with this?
Also my npcs aren't moving, my shopkeeper is moving, but I set a few men and a few guards to walk but they won't do it? Help?

item.title: Some questions! Help please!
item.dc:creator: @DivineSouls DivineSouls
item.description:
@DivineSouls wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]Check the wearID method for the cape, or check Wearing class.

Configure the walking via AutoSpawn config.[/quote]

What’s wrong with my autospawn?

spawn = 9 3114 3515 0 3111 3512 3116 3516 1 Guard
spawn = 9 3113 3513 0 3110 3511 3116 3516 1 Guard
spawn = 9 3109 3514 0 3107 3510 3112 3518 1 Guard
spawn = 1 3094 3511 0 3091 3512 3100 3507 1 Northwest Man
spawn = 1 3097 3511 0 3091 3512 3100 3507 1 Northeast Man
spawn = 3 3098 3509 0 3091 3512 3100 3507 1 Southeast Man
spawn = 3 3093 3509 0 3091 3512 3100 3507 1 Southwest Man
spawn = 2 3095 3510 0 3091 3512 3100 3507 1 Central Man
spawn = 2 3096 3508 0 3091 3512 3100 3507 1 Central Man(South)

public int get CLthieving:

public int GetCLThieving(int ItemID) { if (ItemID == -1) { return 1; } String ItemName = GetItemName(ItemID); if (ItemName.startsWith("Thieving cape")) { return 99; } if (ItemName.startsWith("Thieving hood")) { return 99; } return 1; }

WearID for thieving:

			int CLThieving = server.Wearing.GetCLThieving(wearID);

Read full topic
